text: On goh ki rasulon az pesu pasi onho (paj dar paj) nazdason omadand va guftand, ki cuz Allohi ʙarhaqro maparasted, (ʙa pajomʙaronason) guftand: «Agar Parvardigori mo mexost, ki Uro jagona iʙodat kunem haroina, faristagonero ʙa sifati pajomʙaron az osmon nozil mekard. Pas mo ʙa on ci sumo ʙa on firistoda sudaed, az imon ovardan ʙa Allohi jagona ʙovar nadorem
